content: from pattern *this darling yellow dress has a handful of pastel blossoms sewn randomly to it * **sizes ** 12 mo 18 mo 2 yrs 4 yrs **finished measurements** - underarm = 22 23 5 25 26 5 inches - length = 13 75 16 18 5 20 inches **additional materials ** - small amounts of four additional colors of yarn for flowers - 2 5/8-inch-diameter buttons - 1 5 yards yellow satin ribbon
